body.p: Mr. and Mrs. James McKinnis from Delafield, Wis., are here visiting her folks at the Settlement. Bill Decorah and family are visiting at Mauston, Wis. Mrs. Alice Clouds father, Jim Standing Water, died last week at Mauston. Mr. and Mrs. Eli White Wing, also children George, Katherine and Caroline returned to the Settlement from Sturgeon Bay. Herman Wabshagain and Mr. and Mrs. Sam Little George also returned from Sturgeon Bay last Wednesday. Quite a few Indians went to visit Keshena Fair Sunday. Ray White Wing and family returned after picking blueberries. Oscar Pigeon and his mother are paying a visit to Sarah Johnson at Crandon, Wis. Mr. and Mrs. John C. Decorah are spending their vacation at Star Lake, Wis. Fred Sam is back in the Settlement after staying in St. Paul, Minn., during the winter. .
